setupUi(Form)[source]¶

optimizer.generic_optim module¶

This is deep modification of SLAC version of the Ocelot GUI for the European XFEL facility. Sergey Tomin, 2017. Ocelot GUI, interface for running and testing accelerator optimization methods This file primarily contains the code for the UI and GUI The scanner classes are contained in an external file, scannerThreads.py The resetpanel widget is also contained in a separate module, resetpanel Tyler Cope, 2016

class optimizer.generic_optim.OcelotInterfaceWindow[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QFrame

Main class for the GUI application

Initializes the GUIs plots and labels on startup.

closeEvent(event)[source]¶
create_devices(pvs)[source]¶

Method to create devices using only channels (PVs)

Parameters:pvs – str, device address/channel/PV
Returns:list of the devices [mint.opt_objects.Device(eid=pv[0]), mint.opt_objects.Device(eid=pv[1]), ... ]

getPlotData()[source]¶

Collects data and updates plot on every GUI clock cycle.

indicate_machine_state()[source]¶

Method to indicate of the machine status. Red frames around graphics means that machine status is not OK. :return:

randColor()[source]¶

Generate random line color for each device plotted. :return: QColor object of a random color

Run the editor for edition of the objective function in obj_function.py :return:

Save optimization parameters to the Database

scan_finished()[source]¶
scan_method_select()[source]¶

Sets scanner method from options panel combo box selection. This method executes from the runScan() method, when the UI “Start Scan” button is pressed. :return: Selected scanner object

These objects are contrained in the scannerThreads.py file
setUpMultiPlot(devices)[source]¶

Reset plots when a new scan is started.

Method to set the MachineStatus method self.is_ok using GUI Alarm channel and limits :return: None

Returns:None

Method to start/stop the Optimizer.

class optimizer.generic_optim.customLegend(size=None, offset=None)[source]¶

Bases: pyqtgraph.graphicsItems.LegendItem.LegendItem

STUFF FOR PG CUSTOM LEGEND (subclassed from pyqtgraph). Class responsible for drawing a single item in a LegendItem (sans label). This may be subclassed to draw custom graphics in a Legend.

addItem(item, name, color='CCFF00')[source]¶
optimizer.generic_optim.main()[source]¶

Funciton to start up the main program. Slecting a PV parameter set: If launched from the command line will take an argument with the filename of a parameter file. If no argv[1] is provided, the default list in ./parameters/lclsparams is used. Development mode: If devmode == False - GUI defaults to normal parameter list, defaults to nelder mead simplex if devmode == True - GUI uses 4 development matlab PVs and loaded settings in the method “devmode()”

optimizer.gui_main module¶

Most of GUI logic is placed here. S.Tomin, 2017
